name: DownDuel
description:
DownDuel is a coop game, developed for the Spain Game Dev Jam II, where  the players have to get the other player down to the water to win rounds. If a player wins 4, they won!

Controls Player 1:

WASD for moving 

C for pushing platform

V for Pulling Platform

Controls Player 1:

Keyboard Arrows for moving 

M for pushing platform

N for Pulling Platform

ART: Water Shader from ROystan tutorial: https://roystan.net/articles/toon-water.html

Fx and particles :https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/unique-projectiles-volume-1-...

Sounds from OpenGameArt and zapsplat : https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-category/game-music-and-loops/
